title: Support LFT - Ex Diamond 3 - OCS/Challenger Scene
body:
Message me in-game, I won't check this post too often.

Looking for a Diamond+ team.

Only plat 1 on this account at the moment, just did placements (have been playing on a few of my other accounts). By the time a team is assembled i'll have Diamond again.

Played in OCS quals and peaked D3 in soloQ last season.
